chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 has the above problem:

Hello lovely Back Market Team,
I forgot to enter my voucher code 'APPKASSIEREN' during my order to receive a discount of over €20. Can you still grant me the discount afterwards? Or cancel the order so I can reorder the product with the voucher code and get the discount again?

Best regards 
Nina Klein 

Thank you for your help,

Hello, 

could you please cancel the order?

Thank you very much.

Yours sincerely,
Kubra, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the payment has been finalised and we are unable to refund the discount to the customer. Instead, we have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order, allowing the customer to reorder the product using the discount code. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully cancelled and the customer has been refunded. Kindly ask the customer to reorder the product with the discount code. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
